title: Sugar (carbohydrates) is found in a wide variety of food and drinks
content:
Such as:

  • Glucose
  • Fructose
  • Sucrose
  • Maltose
  • Lactose
  • Dextrose
  • Starch

Also found in or added in:

  • High-fructose corn syrup
  • Fruit juice
  • Raw sugar
  • Honey
  • Candies
  • Desserts
  • Tomato Sauce
  • Yogurt
  • Dried fruit
  • Flavored waters
  • Granola bars
